verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: Stocks] [V: ended] [ARGM-MNR: slightly higher] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-TMP: as investors shrugged off some concerns over a tumultuous G-7 meeting over the weekend at which President Donald Trump lashed out at U.S.] allies.</p >

< p > Stocks ended slightly higher Monday as [ARG0: investors] [V: shrugged] off [ARG1: some concerns over a tumultuous G-7 meeting over the weekend at which President Donald Trump lashed out at U.S.] allies.</p >

< p > Stocks ended slightly higher Monday as investors shrugged off some concerns over a tumultuous G-7 meeting over [ARGM-TMP: the weekend] [R-ARGM-TMP: at which] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: lashed] out [ARG1: at U.S.] allies.</p >
